entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind becoming north 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 4 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 05 March 2023
